post.body: If you mouse over the red button, you get a treat.
Have a precise time!
The character limit makes it much easier for me not to consider whether I'm embarrassing myself.
That is precisely the response I was looking for.
But it already has enough assholes.
Cute! Maine Coony!
Awkwardly and inefficiently, apparently.
Oh, we've got one of those, and you're right. Great for zest, ginger, and certain cheeses.
For the purpose of iTunes a compilation is a collection of songs by more than one act.
I hear you. I was disappointed when we got through the Nineties without a single Eugenics War.
Except for "Put It There" by Paul McCartney, because that's just gross.
Actually, all songs are, in some way, about Peter Gabriel's dick.
The only possible explanation is that Barney has managed to insinuate himself into the collective unconscious. Blast you, Jung!
You know, that question has never been adequately answered for me.
I vote for "The Zeroes"
Nope, just Alanis.
@warrenellis "Thelma and Bruce Lee," not so much.
More Mur tweets are a good thing.
It can, but this is overdue, and also I've been having to fiddle with the settings.
I've got it worked out, but thanks for the help.
Oh, man! Yeah, the video is totally out of sync in preview but it appears to be perfectly normal when exported. Weird! Thanks!
I can export the animation into a Quicktime movie from within Flash, but it's choppy and slow in FCP.
"You ain't nothing but a hound dog, dying all the time."
White Ninja? Or am I being naive?
If you do, use http://www.andyanimator.com/sis/ for lip sync. It's tripled my speed at least. Too bad I didn't buy it last night.
Just finished Wyrd Sisters, moving on to Pyramids next.
That makes me very happy to know. The DUBS deserves to live on.
Aw, man, beat out by the Onion. I guess I'm stuck with re-writing Strawberry Shortcake from the Purple Pieman's perspective.
It sucks to be the victim of bad nog.
That's one of my favorite images now.
I think it's their job to work that out and let me know.
All yours, man. Kind of asking for a series of free clinic visits, though.
Hey, funny!
It would be pretty cool to rip out a guy's heart, then fill it with jam as he watches before he dies.
Those are four good things!
Nice one!
Second Thanksgiving was delicious.
I'm not sure what the "white guys drive like this" of physics jokes is.
I guess that makes Schroedinger's Cat the cat joke of physics jokes.
I am coming to the sudden realization that the Heisenberg Uncertainty Principle is the airline food of physics jokes.
These teriyaki potato chips are like Heisenberg Uncertainty Snacks. Observing their flavor changes it.
Oh, right. Smarter Me blocked that site. Thanks, Smarter Me! I hope to be you again someday!
The thing is, the first immortality device they invent will probably be lame and lack features. But do I wait for the second?
I was probably a happier man before I knew there was a beer called "Porkslap."
Ooh, Amazon now allows you to just see the items that offer free Amazon Prime shipping. I should probably just sign my checks over to them.
Just found out about the red button on http://www.smbc-comics.com/. Good thing I finished work for today.
The Winos of War
Wino Cave National Park
The Wino That Shakes the Barley
The Wino Cries Mary
http://search.twitter.com/search?q=wino to follow
Today, let's all substitute "wino" for "wind": You are the wino beneath my wings.
After some experimentation, I have determined that my singing voice has the approximate range of a five-speed blender.
A thing I got to say today: "Thanks for cleaning up my blood, sweetie."
Saw Twilight. A pleasant melange of treacle and mascara.
My latest video is up at http://tinyurl.com/56ubnc
Just woke up. Also, just realized that "RoboRally" can also be read as "RobOrally."
I'd like to buy an album made up entirely of Miho Hatori swearing for forty-five minutes.
Every time I type in "wikipedia.com" and it switches to "wikipedia.org," I feel like I'm being reprimanded.
I'm finding this handy: http://www.kleimo.com/random/name.cfm
I think I have cartoon mice. There's a perfectly cut-out hole in my baseboard, and my triangular wedge of huge-holed Swiss cheese is gone.
Looking back through Perry Bible Fellowship, I'm struck by its economy of words.
8:30 and I finally feel awake. N.B. I am not normally a night person.
Oh, Jesus. It took me this long to realize you slice down on the OUT STROKE, not the in stroke. This revolutionizes my knife technique.
My friend Linda sent me this, apropos of Muppet sexuality: http://tinyurl.com/yr2s6p
I suppose the quality of cunnilingus from The Count would depend on whether he decided to count licks or orgasms.
I don't imagine Cookie Monster would be good at cunnilingus, but I am not worldly in such matters.
I also like @malki's suggestion: "remembhor."
Wow, Barney & Friends is still on TV? What's the word for fondly looking back on loathing something? Dystalgia? Resentimenality?
People who tag albums need to learn the difference between a collection and a compilation.
I'm disappointed. As far as I can tell, no furry has made a drawing of the Four Horse-Men of the Apocalypse.
Okay, now following all of @jephjacques fictional characters. This will do until I can get Faye to record my answering machine message.
Do they have awards for the best award designers? And if so, do they just win their own award?
This recipe works: http://www.hillhousewriters.com/recipies.htm (Originally from Cook's Illustrated)
I wrote a very short story: http://slumbering.lungfish.com/?p=848
If Randy Newman Wrote Every Movie Theme Song: http://paulandstorm.bandcamp.mu/
Holy God, I have a fully rendered video! I get to sleep tonight!
Why is the Internet so fascinating at 9 am when I have to get down to work, and so boring at 8 pm when I'm waiting for files to render?
When you get down to it, all valleys are kind of uncanny.
So...anyone out there have any experience exporting Flash to Final Cut Pro?
After listening to myself talk in the animation over and over for hours, it's really weird to hear myself talk in real life.
Lips synced! That took a mere seven hours for three minutes of animation. I hope I get faster at this.
Into hour four of lip sync. I forgot how long this takes.
Okay, figured out how to get Flash to play nice with Final Cut Pro. Almost there.
Which means, of course, that the nerdiest thing possible is an infinitely recursing webcomic about a webcomic about a webcomic...
I think if you found the nerdiest thing possible, then made a webcomic about it, the comic would be even nerdier.
Spin Magazine says there's nothing nerdier than webcomics. Also, congrats to @mc_frontalot: http://spin.com/articles/mc-frontalot
It's fun waking up in the morning, seeing a bunch of @ replies, and trying to remember what I said last night.
Actually, a Questionable Content puppet show would be awesome. They could go around to schools and teach kids the importance of T-shirts.
It's like @jephjacques is in my office putting on a puppet show while I work.
Time for a little eggnog and Pratchett in bed.
So weird to see one of my old Brunching bits linked in a random Reddit thread. I'm all "Oh, huh, that sounds kind of familiar."
I'm going to write a sympathetic retelling of the Smurf Mythos from Gargamel's point of view.
Eggnog and Frangelico is yes.
In "Little Drummer Boy," why did the ox and lamb keep time? It's the drummer's job to keep time. The ox and lamb should play bass and keys.
Oh my God this script is terrible. Starting over.
I'll join those pointing out that today you can get @mc_frontalot's new album "Final Boss" for just three bucks: http://bit.ly/Hs8w
"The Safety Dance" is on the front page of Digg. No particular reason, just -- The Safety Dance. I don't know how I feel about that.
I dreamt I was in the Goats comic strip. We were discussing sodomy pills.
"The Gift of the Magi" is the reason I never buy Colette body lotion.
"Buzz! Quiz TV" is great fun, and I am annoyed they don't sell additional wireless buzzers separately.
Today feels like a day to do some serious thinking.
Must remember not to bring up the .999... thing at family gartherings.
Hanukkah is ONukkah!
You know, if it's gonna be a bright day, it's gonna be a sunshiny day by definition. Unless it's gonna be a bright, nuclear-blasty day.
New Alt Text Video: The Story of Santa -- http://tinyurl.com/3u7adw
Hey, thanks for the link and the reminder, @laughingsquid.
I have a nasty case of Boom Blox Arm.
Ah, I didn't know about the @reply setting. Thanks!
If any of you are actually following @doodahfeed, are you getting the messages in your stream? For some reason I'm not.
Once more test the @doodahfeed
Now I test the @doodahfeed
I've decided to take the limiters off @doodahfeed, the better to poke people @wheeepony style. Followers beware.
